Public Remarks: Sunny & desirable Country Home backing onto Bodega Ridge Provincial Park. 4 BR family home set on 7.26 acres of SW facing land ensuring maximum sunlight is captured year-round. The view from the house & extensive deck is one of pastoral tranquility that includes a 2 acre field bordered by a mixture of conifers & hardwoods. Lovely, creek-fed pond by the house. 2 fenced gardens invite to grow a wide variety of fruits & vegetables, thanks to an excellent year round water supply. The property is well equipped to keep horses including a two-box stable, adjoining rooms for equipment & feed storage and a small fenced holding paddock. There is also a fenced riding ring. All the attributes coveted in rural living are combined in this dream property.
